content: Driven by the increasing penetration of 4G, in the second quarter of this year our data and digital revenues were up 17% year-on-year in local currency terms. Our multiplay subscribers, who are consumers of at least one of our digital services on top of our 4G data and voice services, have increased 25% year-on-year and reached 31 million. Total revenues were impacted by lower handset sales, service revenues rose 2.4% year-on-year and EBITDA increased by 11.6%. The entertainment platform Tamasha in Pakistan now has 1.6 million active users, up 95.5% year-on-year and as I mentioned to you, even monthly growth is eye opening.
